overview: In the tradition of great movies such as Mel Gibson's THE PASSION OF THE CHRIST and C.S. Lewis' THE CHRONICLES OF NARNIA, comes a "mystical" love story that movie critics nationwide consider A MUST SEE.  How far would you go for love when the one you cherish hurts you beyond repair? Would you hurt back? Or would you love back? Would you change things? Josh (Mick Shane) is about to find out. He must sacrifice it all, even his own life, for the only woman he has ever loved, Violet (Sylvie Hoffer - Charlie's Angels, Any Given Sunday).  With an "otherworldly" twist that will move you beyond words, THE PARABLE OF THE CHRIST proves to be the greatest love story ever told!
title: The Parable of the Christ
